Raster interpolation between two time periods

inter.Rd

This function calculates suitability values between two time periods with simple interpolation using two raster objects with suitability values.

inter(r1, r2, y1, y2, rastername = NULL, dir_save = NULL)

Arguments

r1

SpatRaster. Raster object for the initial year
r2

SpatRaster. Raster object for the final year
y1

numeric. Initial year
y2

numeric. Final year
rastername

character. Word used as prefix in raster file name. Default NULL
dir_save

character. Directory path and name of the folder in which you want to save the raster files. If NULL, function will return a SpatRaster object, on the contrary, it will save raster in a given directory. Default NULL

Value

This function returns a SpatRaster if dir_save is used as NULL, If dirsave is used, function will return anythink

Examples

if (FALSE) {
require(terra)
require(dplyr)

f <- system.file("external/suit_time_step.tif", package = "flexsdm")
abma <- terra::rast(f)
plot(abma)

int <- inter(
  r1 = abma[[1]],
  r2 = abma[[2]],
  y1 = 2010,
  y2 = 2020,
  rastername = "Abies",
  dir_save = NULL
)

int
}
